name: CRYPTOxAI
desc: It's a cryptocurrency trading platform with real-time monitoring and alerts, plus AI insights and price predictions.

name: My_Opinion
desc: It is a social media platform designed to foster discussions while preventing cyberbullying through machine learning.

name: APNR
desc: Created an Automatic Number Plate Recognition (ANPR) system using Python, OpenCV and EasyOCR.

name: Gaussian vs Cauchy NB
desc: This project implements Gaussian and Cauchy Naive Bayes classifiers and compares their performance.

name: rock-paper-scissors
desc: A classic Rock Paper Scissors game where players compete against the computer with interactive score tracking and results display.

name: profile-card
desc: A stylish profile card, featuring a user's photo, name, bio, and contact information with a clean and responsive design.
